credit_line: Museum purchase from James B. Ford and Peter Cooper Hewitt Estate Funds
title: First Studies for the Villa Stein-de Monzie, Garches, France
provenance: Le Corbusier (Charles Edouard Jeanneret-Gris), prior to 1936
medium: Graphite on white paperboard, mounted on canvas
description: Various working sketches scattered over page.  Floor plans at center and lower left; one elevation at center, left; two exterior aerial perspectives above, two exterior aerial perspectives below, plus additional notations.
name: Drawing
